docpx\Writer¶

Writer

Writes out the documentation.

Methods¶

__construct¶

__construct($docs)¶

Prepares the writer.

Parameters:$docs (array) – Array of Doc nodes.
Return type:void

write¶

write($path)

Writes the output.

Parameters:$path (string) – Path to write the output.

template¶

template($template, $vars)

Parses a template file.

Parameters:
  • $template (string) – Template file to parse
  • $vars (array) – Variables to assign the template.
Return type:

string Parsed template file.
